name: Current Weather Conditions
description: Enable users to view real-time, accurate current weather conditions for selected locations.

name: Hourly Weather Forecasts
description: Provide detailed hourly weather forecasts for user-selected locations.

name: Daily Weather Forecasts
description: Offer comprehensive daily weather forecasts for user-selected locations.

name: Location Selection & Management
description: Allow users to search for, select, and manage locations for which they want to view weather data.

name: Saved Location Management
description: Allow users to add, view, edit, and remove multiple saved locations for quick access to relevant information.

name: Automatic Current Location Detection
description: Enable the application to automatically detect and utilize the user's current geographical location to provide relevant data.

name: User Preferences & Personalization
description: Provide users with the ability to customize application settings, including units of measurement, notification preferences, and other personal display options.

name: Real-time Radar Map Visualization
description: Enable users to view interactive, real-time radar maps displaying current weather phenomena like precipitation and storms, with features such as zooming, panning, and time-lapse playback.

name: Future Precipitation Forecasting
description: Provide interactive visual forecasts for future precipitation, allowing users to see predicted rain, snow, or other precipitation types over various timeframes.

name: Historical Weather Trend Analysis
description: Allow users to visualize and analyze historical weather data trends, including temperature, precipitation, and other meteorological parameters over customizable periods.

name: Severe Weather Warning System
description: Implement a robust system for generating and delivering immediate, critical alerts for severe weather events.

name: Customizable Forecast Notifications
description: Enable users to configure and receive personalized daily or periodic weather forecast notifications.

name: General Weather Alerting
description: Provide a mechanism for issuing and delivering timely alerts for non-severe but relevant weather conditions (e.g., advisories, watches).

name: Notification Preference Management
description: Allow users to manage their preferences for all types of weather alerts and notifications, including delivery methods and frequency.

name: Alert Delivery Mechanisms
description: Establish and integrate various channels for delivering weather alerts and notifications to users (e.g., push, email, SMS).

name: Performance Optimization
description: Improve application speed, responsiveness, and resource efficiency to ensure a fast user experience, including quick load times and smooth interactions.

name: Intuitive User Interface Design
description: Develop an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that allows users to effortlessly navigate the application and understand its functionalities without extensive guidance.

name: Visual Design & Aesthetic Appeal
description: Create a visually appealing and modern user interface with consistent branding, engaging visuals, and a polished look and feel.

name: Cross-Device Responsiveness & Adaptability
description: Ensure the application provides a seamless and consistent user experience across various mobile devices, screen sizes, and orientations, adapting gracefully to different form factors.
